mapper.sql: paper_id, paper_title, paper_brief, create_name, create_time, send_time, remark, total
mapper.delete: delete from da_exam_paper where paper_id = #{paperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND status !='0'
mapper.insert: insert into da_exam_paper (paper_id, paper_title, paper_brief, create_name, create_time, send_time, remark, total) values (#{paperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER})

paper_id,

where paper_id = #{paperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
